title: Validate "Continue" and "Traffic Action" is mutually exclusive
custom_steps:
1. Create Email outbound policy with DLP Profiles P1, P2
2. Select checkbox, "Set action for each profile"
3. Select Action as Alert for p1 and select action add_headers for P2
4. select "continue policy evalution after policy match" checkbox
4. Try to add "Traffic Action", this should not apprear
custom_expected: If continue checkbox selected, then it should not show Traffiic Action and other way around.
